articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Largest iceberg in the world breaks off Antarctica - European Space Agency - Sky News
articles.description: An enormous mass of ice the size of Majorca is adrift in the Weddell Sea after shearing off an Antarctic ice shelf.

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: World’s largest iceberg breaks off in Antarctica as glaciers retreat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Iceberg A-76 calved from the western side of the Ronne Ice Shelf in Antarctica and is now floating on the Weddell Sea, the European Space Agency said.
articles.content:
An iceberg the size of the Spanish island of Majorca has broken off the coast of Antarctica, with measurements taken from satellites and planes confirming its now the worlds largest.

articles.author: Alessandra Scotto di Santolo
articles.title: This is why we left! MEPs furious as unelected EU ignore requests on crucial vaccine rule - Daily Express
articles.description: MEMBERS of the European Parliament were infuriated when they were told by the European Council all their demands on vaccine certificates had been dismissed.

articles.title: Mikel Arteta says it is 'time to deliver' for Arsenal on final day as Roy Hodgson 'knocked over' by Selhurst Park farewell - Sky Sports
articles.description: Mikel Arteta says it is "time to deliver" for Arsenal as they chase a European place on the final day as Roy Hodgson is "knocked over" by his Selhurst Park farewell.
